nodes.text: A prophet was a religious individual who claimed to see visions of the future and told adherents of the religion of his or her visions. The Voss Mystics were Force-using holy men that led Voss society, and were considered Prophets by many. The Prophets of the Dark Side were, likewise, a group of Dark Siders who used the Dark Side to predict and foresee the future, and briefly served the Emperor.
When the Yuuzhan Vong Nom Anor was exiled from the intendant caste for propagating the Jeedai heresy, he became a prophet and took the name Yu'shaa.
